A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I don't know how to rate this movie lower. I was so dissapointed. Rarely do I watch a movie\, and think how boring it is. Had it not been for my son being with me\, I would have walked out. The stupid references\, creatres and comedic moments\, plus so many totally inexplcable or excusable scenes. Nothing was epic. Things were done simply \"because reasons\" Rian Johnson obviously hate Star Wars and should be kept away from cinema in general after this. Go back to Karaoke\, your better at that.
